testcase.name: Verify that user cannot login with valid but not registered email
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to the login page............................................passed When User enter data "dummy_email@yahoo.com" as email.......................passed And Continue button clicked.................................................passed Then Login not proceeding due to the non-existence of the account...........passed

testcase.name: Verify that items are added to cart correctly
testcase.system-out: When Click on All tab.......................................................passed And Go to Today's Deals.....................................................passed * Click on the second Category..............................................passed * Click on the first product on this category...............................passed * Click on the second item in this product..................................passed * Let quantity equals two...................................................passed * Press add to cart button..................................................passed * Navigate to the cart page.................................................passed Then Correct items are added to the cart....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Authentication | Login required to display specific data
testcase.name: Verify that you cannot see “Your Orders” page if you are not logged in
testcase.system-out: When Hover on Hello, sign in Account & Lists................................passed And CLick on Your orders....................................................passed Then login page displayed...................................................passed

testcase.system-out: When Hover on Hello, sign in Account & Lists................................passed And CLick on Your Addresses.................................................passed Then login page displayed...................................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Authentication | Login required to display specific data
